title.rendered: Tastebudz Seeds Auto Mix 2 – Experience our 4 Latest cannabis Strains!

content.rendered:
Tastebudz Autoflower Seed Variety Pack – Auto Mix 2

A Perfect Blend of Tastebudz’ Finest Autoflowering Strains

Looking for a convenient and cost-effective way to try out some exciting autoflowering cannabis strains? Tastebudz Autoflower Seed Variety Pack (Auto Mix 2) is your perfect solution! This curated collection offers a selection of some of our most popular and flavorful autoflowering strains, giving you the chance to explore a variety of effects and profiles.

Each strain comes individually labelled in glass vials for easy identification. With 3 seeds of each strain included in the pack, you’ll have plenty of seeds to experiment with and find your new favourite strain.

🍀 What’s Inside the Tastebudz Autoflower Seed Variety Pack?

  • 3 x Moonberry Pie Auto Feminized seeds
  • 3 x Yuzu Sour Auto Feminized seeds
  • 3 x Pink Apple Soda Auto Feminized seeds
  • 3 x Sticky Mango Auto Feminized seeds

These strains come from a perfect blend of high-quality genetics, ideal for both novice and experienced cultivators. Plus, the feminized, autoflowering nature makes these seeds incredibly easy to collect, with minimal maintenance required.

📊 Tastebudz Autoflower Seed Variety Pack – Auto Mix 2 Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Moonberry Pie Auto, Pink Apple Soda Auto, Sticky Mango Auto, Yuzu Sour Auto
Flowering Time 8–9 Weeks (Autoflowering)
Indoor Yield Up to 500 g/m²
Outdoor Yield Up to 600 g/plant
THC Content Up to 25%
Flavours Fruity, Tangy, Sweet, Citrus, Tropical
Aromas Sweet, Zesty, Resinous, Earthy
Strain Type 100% Autoflowering Feminized

💨 Why Choose the Tastebudz Autoflower Seed Variety Pack?

  • 🍏 4 incredible autoflowering strains in one pack – Moonberry Pie Auto, Pink Apple Soda Auto, Sticky Mango Auto, and Yuzu Sour Auto.
  • 🌿 Variety: Great mix of flavours, from fruity and citrusy to relaxing and uplifting.
  • 🌱 Easy to grow: Autoflowering seeds that require minimal attention, perfect for beginner seed collectors.
  • ⏱ Fast flowering time: Expect a quick turnaround with a flowering time of 8–9 weeks.
  • 🎁 Perfect for collectors: Discover new strains and diversify your cannabis seed collection.
  • 🌍 Global availability: Purchase from reputable retailers around the world, including the USA.
  • 💪 High-yielding: Indoor yields of up to 500 g/m², with outdoor yields reaching up to 600 g per plant.

Whether you’re a casual enthusiast or a seasoned seed collector, the Auto Mix 2 pack offers exceptional value, allowing you to explore a variety of unique strains without the commitment of purchasing individual packs. With a range of potent, flavorful strains, this mix guarantees a satisfying experience for collectors of all levels.

Please Note: Tastebudz Autoflower Seed Variety Pack (Auto Mix 2) is sold as souvenirs only, in accordance with UK laws. Always ensure compliance with your local laws before purchasing.

🔗 Also Available From Our Official Retailers

Looking for Tastebudz Autoflower Seed Variety Pack from a trusted seedbank near you? This pack is available through our network of verified retailers.

📜 Legal Notice

All cannabis seeds sold by Tastebudz Syndicate are intended as adult genetic souvenirs. Germination or cultivation of cannabis seeds is illegal in the UK without a government-issued license. Please ensure you are aware of and compliant with local laws.
